name: buildmail
description: buildmail is a low level rfc2822 message composer. Define your own mime tree, no magic included. Forked from git://github.com/andris9/buildmail.git. This version allows for a somewhat ham-fisted approach to creating the email, allowing the creator to bypass some of the composition protections built in to the original.
author: Dan Nielsen <dnielsen@reachmail.com>
